headline: Rising Costs From Tariffed Goods Push Retail Prices Higher In August
summary: Retailers are navigating a fresh wave of pricing shifts as August inflation and new tariffs push up costs in categories like autoparts, furniture, and home improvement, signaling tighter conditions ahead for companies from Walmart Inc. (NYSE:WMT) to Best Buy Co. Inc. (NYSE:BBY). JP Morgan analyst Christopher Horvers provided fresh insights into pricing trends across the broadlines and hardlines retail sector, highlighting the impact of August inflation on key categories. headline: UBER Vs. GRAB: Which Ride-Hailing Stock Has Better Upside Potential?
summary: Uber's global reach, strong earnings, and bold buybacks give it an edge over Grab's narrower Southeast Asian focus.
